mapper.select: INSERT INTO PUBLIC.todo_item (id, title, description, due_date, todo_list_id) SELECT to_char(current_date, 'YYMMDD') || '-' || lpad((coalesce(max(substring(ti.id, 8, 10)::int), 0) + 1)::text, 3, '0'), #{title}, #{description}, #{dueDate}, #{todoListId} FROM PUBLIC.todo_item as ti WHERE substring(ti.id, 1, 6) = to_char(current_date, 'YYMMDD') RETURNING id
